dict.acceptation: 建筑学；建筑风格；体系结构；（总体、层次）结构；

sent.orig: Architecture: The type of processor the computer uses is referred to as its architecture.
sent.trans: Architecture:计算机所用处理器的类型决定它的架构。

sent.orig: In this paper, We introduce how to build BSS service system with Service-oriented Architecture (SOA).
sent.trans: 在本文中也结合了面向服务的体系结构(Service-oriented Architecture,SOA)来构建电信BSS系统。

sent.orig: The architecture of Huizhou style is a unique architecture genre in Chinese architecture history.
sent.trans: 徽派建筑是中国建筑史上独具特色的一个建筑体系。

sent.orig: Prehistoric architecture is the source of architecture, its development exert a tremendous influence on later architecture.
sent.trans: 史前建筑是建筑之源，其形成和发展过程对后代影响巨大。

sent.orig: Neoclassical architecture: Revival of Classical architecture during the 18th and early 19th centuries.
sent.trans: 新古典建筑：18世纪和19世纪早期的现代古典主义（以其当时所流传的名称）。
